${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ManyTap.NAME: Many Tap
${modID}:ManyTap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to the enemy NL 5 times

${modID}:EnoughWeakness.NAME: Enough Weakness
${modID}:EnoughWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Demon Form Equal to your Debuffs

${modID}:UnrelentingAttack.NAME: Unrelenting Attack
${modID}:UnrelentingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damagae to a random enemy for every me there are in your deck

${modID}:ReverseHeal.NAME: Reverse Heal
${modID}:ReverseHeal.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 hp NL Deal !D! damage !M! times

${modID}:BulkTrain.NAME: Bulk Train
${modID}:BulkTrain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength NL Increase this by 1 this combat
${modID}:BulkTrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! NL Increase this by 2 this combat

${modID}:Retaliate.NAME: Retaliate
${modID}:Retaliate.DESCRIPTION: Dead !D! Damage NL Gain !M! Energy if you have a debuff

${modID}:Stroid.NAME: Str-oid
${modID}:Stroid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength NL Loose 10 Strength next turn

${modID}:MyTurn.NAME: My Turn
${modID}:MyTurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Gain !B! Block NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OffenseIsDefense.NAME: Offense Is Defense
${modID}:OffenseIsDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain Metallicize Equal to !M!% of your Strength

${modID}:DevilsDeal.NAME: Devil's Deal
${modID}:DevilsDeal.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 Hp NL Gain !M! Demon Form

${modID}:Slip.NAME: Slip
${modID}:Slip.DESCRIPTION: Give !M! vulnerable to ALL Enemies NL Draw !BestMod:Draw

${modID}:OilSplash.NAME: OilSplash
${modID}:OilSplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Upgrade a searing blow in your deck
${modID}:OilSplash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Upgrade a searing blow in your deck TWICE

${modID}:LowerYourselves.NAME: Lower Yourselves!
${modID}:LowerYourselves.DESCRIPTION: Give !M! vulnerable to ALL Enemies NL Give !M! weak to ALL Enemies

${modID}:ICanDoThisAllDay.NAME: I Can Do This All Day
${modID}:ICanDoThisAllDay.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Mana per Enemy in Battle

${modID}:DevilsDance.NAME: Devil's Dance
${modID}:DevilsDance.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Demon Form NL Gain !M! Vulnerable and Weak

${modID}:NotTodayButTomorrow.NAME: Not Today But Tomorrow
${modID}:NotTodayButTomorrow.DESCRIPTION: Lose All Strength NL Gain 1 Demon Form per 5 lost NL (Max !M!)

${modID}:PowerIsDefense.NAME: Power Is Defense
${modID}:PowerIsDefense.DESCRIPTION: Lose AtMost !M! Strength NL Gain 5 Block per Strength Lost

${modID}:SetStrike.NAME: Set Strike
${modID}:SetStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Create !M! copies of Me in your Draw Pile

${modID}:FinishingStrike.NAME: Finishing Strike
${modID}:FinishingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Repeat For Every Strike In Your Deck

${modID}:CleansingStrike.NAME: Cleansning Strike
${modID}:CleansingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! Weak From Yourself NL Deal !D! Damage

${modID}:FinalStrike.NAME: Final Strike
${modID}:FinalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Deal !D! Damage NL Gain !M! Energy if Fatal
${modID}:FinalStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Deal !D! Damage NL Gain !M! Energy if Fatal
